heading: DXF Optimizer for Laser Cutting
preamble: Upload a DXF file to remove duplicate entities (lines, arcs, etc.) that are exactly on top of each other.
dragDropText: Drag and drop your DXF file here, or click to select
previewNote: Note: Preview supports LINE, CIRCLE, ARC, LWPOLYLINE, POLYLINE, SPLINE, ELLIPSE, SOLID, TEXT, MTEXT, INSERT and POINT entities.
unsupportedWarningPrefix: The following entity types were found but are not currently supported in the preview:
unsupportedWarningSuffix: . They will still be included in the optimized file.
